skill.name: the-oracle
skill.description: This skill should be used when the user asks to "use the oracle" or "ask the oracle" for deep research, analysis, or architectural questions. The oracle excels at multi-source research combining codebase exploration and web searches, then synthesizing findings into actionable answers. Use for complex questions requiring investigation across multiple sources, architectural analysis, refactoring plans, debugging mysteries, and code reviews.

skill.author: Cygnusfear

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and structured prompt templates. No executable code, no network operations, no filesystem access beyond standard AI tool capabilities, and no suspicious patterns detected.

content.user_title: Get deep research answers from the Oracle
content.value_statement: Complex questions often require investigation across multiple sources including codebase exploration and web searches. The Oracle dispatches a dedicated research agent that synthesizes findings into actionable answers with supporting evidence.
actual_capabilities: Dispatches dedicated research agent for complex questions
Combines codebase exploration with web searches
Provides evidence with file paths and line numbers
Analyzes architectural patterns and design issues
Traces code paths and dependencies for debugging
limitations: Does not execute code or make changes to the codebase
Depends on available context and accessible files
Web search limited to publicly available information

use_cases.title: Analyze System Architecture
use_cases.description: Investigate current architectural patterns and design improvements for complex systems

use_cases.title: Debug Complex Issues
use_cases.description: Trace root causes through code paths and log analysis with multi-source investigation

use_cases.title: Comprehensive Code Reviews
use_cases.description: Deep analysis of code quality, edge cases, performance issues, and security risks

prompt_templates.title: Quick Question
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the oracle to answer: What does the configLoader function do in src/config.js?

prompt_templates.title: Architecture Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the oracle to analyze the authentication architecture. Focus on session management, token handling, and security concerns. Identify any architectural problems and suggest improvements.

prompt_templates.title: Debug Investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the oracle to investigate the failure in user creation based on error.log. Find the root cause, trace all error paths, and recommend fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the oracle to review the payment module we just wrote. Analyze correctness, edge cases, security, performance, and provide specific improvement recommendations with file references.

output_examples.input: Use the oracle to understand why user authentication fails on production but works locally
output: Root cause identified: Environment variable mismatch in database connection string
Production uses environment-specific hostname while local uses localhost
Fix: Update config loading to use environment-aware connection handling
Recommended action: Add environment validation in startup checks

best_practices: Provide specific files, logs, or error messages as context to narrow the search space
Define clear success criteria describing what a satisfactory answer looks like
Ask follow-up questions to dive deeper into specific findings
anti_patterns: Using the Oracle for simple questions that can be answered directly
Providing insufficient context leading to surface-level analysis
Expecting code fixes rather than investigation and recommendations

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: The Oracle works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code when the Task tool with general-purpose subagent is available.

faq.question: What types of questions work best?
faq.answer: Complex questions requiring investigation across code, documentation, logs, or external sources work best.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my codebase?
faq.answer: No. The Oracle only researches and reports findings. It does not write files or execute changes.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only accesses files and data you explicitly provide as context. No external data collection occurs.

faq.question: Why does it use extended thinking?
faq.answer: Deep research requires thorough investigation. Extended thinking enables comprehensive multi-source analysis.

faq.question: How is this different from a normal conversation?
faq.answer: The Oracle dispatches a dedicated research agent with structured methodology for thorough investigation.
